name: Go Micro
overview: A quizmaster quiz about all things microcomputer. At last - a clear and interesting introduction to the Commodore 64 that doesn't expect you to be a programming genius! In this pack you will find all you really need to know to enjoy using your micro. What it can do. How it does it. What software to use. So you and the whole family can get the most out of the new technology - quickly, simply and enjoyably. The pack contains a color illustrated book explaining how the computer works, with special features on color, graphics, sound, databases and software. a cassette containing five big programs for your Commodore 64, introducing the keyboard, graphics, sound, a home datafile and a great family quiz. The ideal introduction to the Commodore 64 for the whole family.
